Instructions:
**Alpha**: A, B, T, W, C, H

**Alpha**: I, J, K, E, F, #, signs, D, Q, U, V, X, Y, Z

Rationale: Handles Special Chars and Alpha Group I-Z. [cite: 7]

Instructions:
**Alpha**: L, P, M, N, O, R, G
**Email**: valeria.sanchez@arrow.com

1. Search for the order number/SO number in the 'Digital Customer Tab' on SWB to obtain a summary (notes, vendor name, status, internal tracking). [cite: 161]\n2. Search the order confirmation number in Salesforce to review cases being managed by Customer Support or OMT. [cite: 163]\n3. For supplier orders, search for the PO number in Salesforce. [cite: 164]
Rationale: Determining if an inquiry is already being handled or if a task is currently open. [cite: 158]

Instructions:
1. Open the 'Digital Customer' section from the Customer Tab. [cite: 181]
2. Search with the WEB SO or SO number. [cite: 200]
3. Click anywhere on the order line result to view specific OMT action notes. [cite: 200]
4. Note: Release of alerts cannot be expedited. OMT coordinates with appropriate teams for release. [cite: 15]
Rationale: Determining the specific cause of an OMT hold and policy on expedition. [cite: 166]

Instructions:
1. ETQ Portal > All Modules > eRequests: Quality, GTMC & Warehouse. [cite: 42]
2. New Document > Warehouse Requests > 'Sure Ship Domestic - Draft'. [cite: 43]
3. Select Warehouse Code (e.g., V72) from lookup. [cite: 44]
4. Select 'AC Prod' in the Host box. [cite: 47]
5. Enter SO, Delivery ID, and line numbers. [cite: 46]
6. Enter note: 'Hello team, could you please arrange shipment for DID provided? It has been picked/released since [DATE].' [cite: 48, 49]
Rationale: Expediting Reno orders in 'Released to Warehouse' or 'Picked' status for >2 days. [cite: 41]

Instructions: 1. ETQ Portal > New Document > Warehouse Requests > 'Sure Ship International - Draft'. [cite: 57]\n2. Select Code CDR or CDM. \n3. Note: Use this for tracking numbers not reflected in Unity. Note 'order appears shipped but tracking is not available' in comments. [cite: 62, 63]
Rationale: Expediting cross-dock orders at Reno hub and resolving missing tracking. [cite: 54, 62]

Instructions: 1. ETQ Portal > New Document > Warehouse Requests > 'Receiving Expedite - Draft'. [cite: 69, 70]\n2. Fill: Supplier PO, Carrier, Tracking Number, and Date of Arrival. [cite: 72]\n3. Note: If DHL does not specify the signer, enter 'N/A' in the 'Signed By' box. [cite: 74, 75]
Rationale: For items delivered to Reno hub but in 'Awaiting Receipt' for >3 days. [cite: 65]

Instructions: 1. Open Salesforce Case: 'Expedite Receiving [Supplier PO No.] / SO[NUM]'. [cite: 79]\n2. Email URGENTRECEIVING.HK@arrowasia.com. [cite: 79]\n3. Body: 'Hi team, please expedite receiving: Supplier PO: / SO: / Supplier: / Tracking: / Carrier: / Arrival Date: / MPN: / QTY:'. [cite: 79, 80]
Rationale: For HK items delivered but showing 'Awaiting Receipt' for >3 days. [cite: 78]

Instructions: 1. Open Salesforce Case. [cite: 88]\n2. Sure Ship: Email ecommerce.dlc.emea@arrow.com and Helpdeskvenlo.dlc.emea@arrow.com. [cite: 88]\n3. Receiving: Email business.support.pdc.emea@arrow.com with tracking and received date. [cite: 89]
Rationale: Expediting orders processed at the Venlo, Netherlands facility. [cite: 87]

Instructions:
1. MyConnect Portal > 'Digital Issue'. [cite: 108]
2. Select Website (Arrow.com or Verical). [cite: 109]
3. Required: URL/Link, Screenshot of error, WEB-SO number, and User Email. [cite: 108]
4. Template: 'Customer [Email] is seeing blocked user message on [Website]. Account not blocked in SWB. Please verify.' [cite: 111]
Rationale: Reporting technical errors, bugs, or 'Blocked User' messages. [cite: 108, 111]

Instructions: 1. MyConnect Portal > 'Warehouse IT Support - WMS'. [cite: 100]\n2. Required: Delivery ID, Warehouse Code, and Pick Status on SWB. [cite: 101]\n3. Template: 'Hello, please check DIDXXX from [Whs Code]. It has been in XX status since [DATE]. Please advise.' [cite: 102]
Rationale: For orders with DIDs stuck in 'Ready to Release' (>24h) or 'Picked' (>7 days). [cite: 100]

Instructions:
1. Identify unpaid order in AP report. [cite: 1]
2. Create new SO using original info (Ensure MFR includes 3rd party supplier). [cite: 3]
3. Update Resale to $0.00. [cite: 3]
4. Remove Freight charges. [cite: 3]
5. Hold Code: 'Replacement SO; reaching out to [SUPPLIER] for PO Cancellation'. [cite: 5]
Rationale: To pay 3rd party suppliers when the original order cannot be billed. [cite: 3]

Instructions:
1. Wait 30 mins for PO to generate in SWB (Info > Drop Ship). [cite: 6]
2. Email AP (Subject: 'Dropship Order D[NUM] - Please confirm receipt'). [cite: 7]
3. Body: 'Please confirm receipt of replacement Dropship Order D[NUM] to pay [SUPPLIER] for Invoice #[INV].' [cite: 7]
4. Email Supplier POC (Waldom: Kellys@waldom.com / Air Electro: LBuckley@airelectro.com) to cancel original PO. [cite: 8]
1. Email verical-logistics@verical.com (CC: amunoz@arrow.com, jawells@arrow.com). [cite: 4]\n2. Body: 'Hello Team, could you please provide MFG CoC for WEB-SO: / PO: / Delivery ID#: / MPN: / Line#:'.
Rationale: Specific template for Nogales warehouse certificate of compliance requests. [cite: 27]
